name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Java Developer with over 10 years of experience in delivering high-performance software solutions, with expertise in **Java 8+**, **Spring**, **Spring Boot**, and **Vert.x**. Proficient in building robust applications and services utilizing **Cucumber** for Behavior Driven Development (BDD) and adept in SQL for effective database management. Skilled in leveraging modern technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, alongside frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js** for comprehensive full stack development. Proven track record in developing cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS**. Strong background in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, ensuring secure and maintainable solutions that adhere to compliance standards. Practical experience in MLOps using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, complementing strong analytical skills with a passion for driving impactful technological solutions.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed scalable backend solutions using **Java 8+**, **Spring**, and **Spring Boot** to meet diverse business requirements in healthcare and finance, ensuring high performance and availability.
• Crafted and executed test cases following BDD principles with **Cucumber**, enhancing code quality and reducing bugs by **30%** prior to production.
• Implemented SQL databases to manage and optimize data retrieval processes, leading to a **25%** increase in query performance for critical financial applications.
• Engaged in collaborative development using **Vert.x** for reactive programming, which improved application responsiveness and reduced latency by up to **15%**.
• Integrated CI/CD pipelines utilizing tools like Jenkins and GitHub Actions for seamless deployments, which reduced deployment time from **2 hours** to **15 minutes**.
• Worked with cross-functional teams to integrate user feedback and enhance system functionalities, resulting in a **40%** increase in user satisfaction metrics.
• Participated in code reviews and provided mentorship to junior developers, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and knowledge sharing.
• Maintained software documentation and specifications to comply with regulatory standards, ensuring transparency and alignment with business goals.

Utilized **Java 8+**, **Spring**, and **Spring Boot** to develop scalable and efficient backend services tailored for high-volume transaction processing.
Implemented **Vert.x** for reactive programming, enhancing application performance and responsiveness in financial platforms.
Designed and optimized SQL databases to ensure robust data integrity and fast retrieval times, managing large datasets effectively.
Practiced Behavior-Driven Development (BDD) using **Cucumber**, ensuring high-quality code through automated testing and documentation.
Led a team to modernize legacy systems, improving architecture resilience and maintainability with a target improvement in throughput by **30%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate APIs supporting real-time transaction processing, achieving a **99.9%** uptime in production environments.
Contributed to the implementation of CI/CD pipelines, increasing deployment frequency by **50%**, minimizing release risks and facilitating quicker feature deliveries.
Mentored junior developers in using Java frameworks and best practices, resulting in improved code quality and team productivity.

Developed and maintained scalable backend services for a global e-commerce platform using **Java 8+** with **Spring Boot** and **Vert.x**, ensuring high availability and low latency across key modules such as checkout and order fulfillment.
Implemented behavior-driven development (BDD) practices using **Cucumber** to enhance test automation and ensure quality across all levels of the application.
Engineered real-time features that enhance customer experiences and order updates, driving engagement (achieving **95%** customer satisfaction ratings).
Designed and optimized relational databases using **SQL** to ensure fast, fault-tolerant data access for **over 200,000** daily transactions during peak traffic.
Collaborated in a cross-functional team environment to ensure effective integration of frontend frameworks, contributing to a **30%** increase in application performance and responsiveness.
Integrated AI/ML-based elements within the application to optimize product listings, which achieved a **15%** improvement in conversion rates based on real-time behavioral data.
Implemented feature flags and deployment strategies, achieving seamless rollouts and significantly reducing downtime during updates by **70%**.
Created secure payment workflows integrated with third-party payment processors ensuring PCI compliance while managing **over 50,000** transactions monthly.
Developed comprehensive unit and integration tests in accordance with BDD principles, utilizing **Cucumber** to ensure enterprise-level quality and reliability of the codebase.
Applied role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** for secure access management, ensuring GDPR compliance and robust user data protection throughout the platform.
